definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="EnchantmentLevel">EnchantmentLevel</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="360" y="46"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Ghosted</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">EntityVex</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
